Blog.post: liew yst nitex cant reallie slp at all.. maybe becos in the day i slp too much.. if nt tink too much cant slp.. den turn here turn dere... still cant find the bez position to slp.. pek chek.. sumore kip coughin.. ah... wanna die liao lahx.. hope tonitex wun happen same ting.. if nt reallie can go jump liaox.. hahax.. todae hardworkin nehx.. now study econs.. hope can finish by todae lahx.. hmm duno y dese few daes like verli interested in cookin.. even ask mi mama to teach mi.. but ish bai wen de.. cos she dun reallie noe how to cook.. hahax.. hmm.. i wanna learn to cook the herbal soup.. cos i like to drink verli much.. sho nxt time if feel like drinkin can cook myself n den nxt time can cook for mi hubby... c i sho gd.. hahax.. tink i xiang tai duo le lahx.. dun even haf a bf now... :P ya.. den zhong qiu jie comin oso.. tot of makin moon cake.. but hu noe lehx.. hmm tryin to find a way.......

wah todae i slp for... 12 hrs.. from yst 3am till todae 12 pm den cont from 2pm to 7pm.. hahax li hai bax.. act intend to study de but den nehx.. no mood.. sianx.. sho go oror lorx.. act slp qt gd lehx.. cos can prevent one pple from tinkin too much.. hahax.. sho lehx.. tink dose depression de patients shld slp morex.. lolx hmm.. tink tml reallie nit to study le if nt reallie CMI le.. haix.. sian arx.. act oso nth to write le.. sho tink will end here bax..

hehex.. ish fun todae.. todae we went cine to watch AVP... nice show.. hahax.. abit jing zhang.. den cc was holdin her bag up to her face thru out the show.. while i kip covering mi mouth wif mi hand cos i scared i will scream.. hahax afta the show lehx we went to take NEOPRINTS.. it was the funest part.. hahax.take 3 times sum more.. den all the pic come out verli cute... hahax when decorate tt time.. kip aimin at jenson to put all dose strange strange pictures hahax.. finallie we went the somerset dere to eat.. we ordered "fried oyster..chilli crab..satay..popia" tink tts all bax..den eat aleadi verli full.. den take pic... hehex.. ya n i forget to sae.. den at the place wher we eat horx.. saw sumone look like MENG ZHE le.. sho cute hahax.. at last go hm le.... sobx.. tiredx...

dun reallie feel well todae.. physically n emotionally.. physically.. i m sick.. coughin all the wae... den when slpin.. i cant reallie breathe well.. haix.. hao xin ku arx.. den emotionally.. duno le jus nt feelin well oso... lata gg out wif j4r to catch a movie.. AVP.. dunoe nice ant.. hope sho.. if nt gonna waste money.. wo bu gan yuan.. hahax.. hmm.. alot of show comin up.. hope i can catch all of dem... :P esp THREE 2 n THE TWINS EFFECT 2.....

si liao lahx.. tink i reallie gonna be sick soonx.. gt tt phenomenon.. i hardli sick de den if reallie sick.. den it will be verli jialet.. like sec 2 tt time.. sick until go hospital stay for abt a wk.. zhe me ban... gt tt feelin le hope dun come thru hahax.. act nt scared gg in to stay.. altho nit to put the glucose needle into mi hand lahx.. n rmb tt stupid nurse poke alreadi take out 3 times cos she cant find the blood vessel.. aiyo can she be zhuan ye yi dianx.. pple pain de lehx..hahax.. i jus scared the loneliness dere.. everydae jus lie down dere wait mornx.. wait parents come c mi.. wait nitex.. den the cycle repeats again.. gen ben no one besides mi parents come visit mi hao ji mo.. i cant watch tv oso.. haix.. tink sho much oso no use cos i nt gg to stay again ritex=)

wah!!! todae wanna go siao liao le... sit in front of mi laptop doin dreamweaver for the whole dae... ARGH!!!! stupid dreamweaver.. hahax.. but act i tot it was quite fun lahx.. cos u get to create ya own web page.. den out all dose picx n songs n movie clips.. hahax.. if ur gt chance let u all c.. i tink its qt nice.. hehex.. den todae spend all the time doin the dreamweaver... no time to study.. haix duno if gt time to finish revisin ant.. MIEC seems tough nehx.. haix jus jin li bax.. hehex tml ben lai gonna watch movie wif j4r de.. but den one by one cannot make it left onlie mi jing jing n jenson.. three pple go watch verli sianx.. tink wil postpone bax.. sho tml lehx duno will go out ant.. cos mi n jing jing tot of gg out to destress cos stayin at hm study wanna siao liaox.. hahax.. now findin pple.. hope tml can go out bax.. ya.. n horx.. A CINDERELLA STORY.. the movie ish comin out lehx.. hehex.. i MUX go n watch.. cos i like cinderella alot.. duno y since young like tt fairy tale.. hehex

mornx.. hmm shld be noonx.. go CP Mac again wif cc to study.. hahax initiallie wanna study de but den ended up doin all our blog stuff till 3 den start to revise our BSTATS.. hmm manage to finish 3 chaps.. bu cuo bax.. hahax but is like jus read thru nia lorx.. hehex.. ashita mux gambatte.. durin our revision.. cc kip lookin at babies.. tink she reallie like dem alot.. hahax if reallie like dem go gif birth yaself lahx.. :P den horx we saw one baby look like the taiwan artist le.. noe the HU GUA.. zhen de hen xiang.. hahax.. altho like we abit bad lahx.. but den reallie look alike mahx.. hahax.. of cos besides tt we tok alot like.. expected de mahx.. hahax afta tt mit mi mama n papa go buy new fone.. cos mi mama wan spoil liaox.. den she wanna use mi old wan.. sho i go buy new wan lorx.. took the m1 suntext plan n the samsung x430.. without de cam de.. but den qt nice lahx.. at first wanna take the panasonic x66 gt cam.. but den the function like nt tt gd.. sho take de samsung wan betta hehex.. den horx saw sumore reallie look like jer lex.. the person hu help us write dose form de.. reallie look alike lorx.. deir eyes machiam de same de.. dose will put electric de.. hahax... but den the lower part of their face nt same.. hahax even mi mama oso sae he look like jer.. tink his name ish sherman lim.. den mi mama verli wat de lehx.. kip askin nit part time ant.. den ask mi go dere work.. hahax.. like wanna cuo he mi n him like tt.. siao dex.. hahax

jus gt back from jap cls.. verli hungry.. ate curry veg wit rice... shld sae 2 servings bax.. hahax.. reallie tu zi er lo.. hmm JLPT4 cumin le.. yao yong gong if nt arx.. waste money nehx.. sho.. mux start revisin le hahax.. altho ish kind of earlie.. den durin the lesson mi n cy tot of gg to japan.. haix.. wanna go ish wan ting.. got money to go ant ish another ting... even if gt $ to go dere le.. oso mux haf $ to shop oso.. if nt go dere for wat ritex.. :P sho nehx.. start from now i mux save money.. frenx pls encourage mi lehx.. hahax.. noe lahx i like to anyhow hua $ dex.. but wei le neng fulfil mi dreamx... hmm.. gambatte nehx..

hmm tink tis blog will speciallie write for mi j4r.. heyx u guys shld be guang rong lorx.. speciallie write for u all ish hen nan de de shi nehx.. hahax j4r = jeff, john, jenson, jing jing and rena.. hehez.. ish act j3r de but lata on i pull mi bez fren inside.. den add one more J liao le.. hmm tis grp le form afta the FOC Camp dex.. cos we qt gum mahx.. horx.. hehex.. still rmb the last nitex.. go play dai dee wif john n jenson.. den i kip winnin hahax.. hey ish nt luckie lorx.. ish ben xiao jie gt skill.. :P afta tt tt 2 pig go slp.. left mi alone watch sun rise.. hahax.. den gt one of dem snore lehx.. but i shldn't sae hu lahx.. hahax.. i kip the secret til now noe.. :P afta the camp organise some outings lahx... hmm tink onlie gt 1 niax. hahax. the outing ish we go seoul garden eat.. act wanan go to the somerset dere to eat dex.. but den too crowded le den no place to sit oso sho went to seoul garden lorx.. hahax.. eat wif dem de experience qt fun lahx... esp when we taking fotos tt time.. den dose 3 guys act guy sumore.. bth.. hahax hmm tink tis thu we gonna oraganise another outing to watch movie.. hope tt it will b a fun wan.. or shld i sae it will definitely b a fun wan.. hehex.. j4r RoX~~!!
urlLink j3r(jeff, jenson, john, rena).. shld be j4r de but den jingjing helpin us to take the pic.. hehex urlLink

haix.. act wanna go watch fireworkx wif liting de.. but den kena flu.. tink yst nitex slp too late den sick le lorx.. hmm.. tink tink too much den slp sho late.. haix..qt moody yst.. xing qing bu hao dao anything oso dun wanna do.. haix.. sumtimes on the outside pple may lead a verli bz life.. like dose owes go out shopping... den seems verli happie all the times dex.. but den lehx inside dem seems verli empty.. verli alone.. n mi lehx.. ish tt kind of person.. hahax..hard to tell ritex.. but wo jiu shi na yang.. everything oso kip to myself.. kind of selfish ritex.. but i jus duno y i cant speak out.. i jus cant.. haix tink i shld change.. cos its like kipin everyting to miself onlie make mi more shang xin more nan guo.. but wat can i do??? hahax.. pple sae tt 'de bu dao de yong yuan shi zui hao de' and i totallie agree.. last time agree now oso.. hahax.. cos when u de dao le.. u tend to forget how xing fu u r to haf it.. den when u lose it de shi hou.. u began to hou hui.. but it ish alreadi too late le.. sho to all pple reading mi blog.. rmb.. cherish wat u haf now.. cos when u lose it de shi hou.. u yi ding hui hou hui dex.. =)

tml at marina promenade haf fireworkx~~~!!! initiallie wanted to go badli to c dose mesmerisin de fireworks.. but den now i dun feel like gg liao le.. hahax san xin er yi ritex.. mi owes like tt dex.. den in the make zi ji regret the tings i haf done.. but sho wat its alreadi too late to change anything le arx.. owes wanna cont to look in front but the past kept floodin mi mind.. but wat can i do?? hahax suan le larx.. mei ren neng jiu wo de.. rang mi si le bax... hahahahx~~!!!

tis entry ish to tell the pple that i DUN LIKE TERENCE LIM... hahax.. mi jus feel that he ish qt shuaix nia.. tts all.. hahax u all arx dun ji xiao mi liaox k.. :P hmm todae end sch at 12 den act tot of studyin in sch but when we reach canteen 1.. mi n cc sian half liaox.. cos ish sho mani pple.. den both of us oso verli tired bcos mornx gt SnW.. hmm act onlie mi lahx cos cc din play.. her toe still pain.. den nehx go find isk n ken go pool factor play pool.. reallie dun like the pool dere lehx.. the ballx nt nice to play de... rather play in mambo.. altho ish $1 more.. den afta tt wok back sch to go to the jap tsubasa mitin lorx.. hmm.. in tt mitin saw a guy reallie look like ding cong lehx... action + looks.. almost the same.. reallie.. but if ask hu looks betta lehx.. hmm hahax tink both same same bax.. qt gd lookin.. :P in tt mitin oso sae some cute guys.. esp the one sitin behind mi n cc... he look cute lorx.. esp wif his slpy eyes.. hahax.. sumore when go hm tt time took same bus wif us.. sho qiao.. but in the bus mi n cc slp den duno wat stop he alite.. hehex.. hols lehx.. but den nehx like dun haf the mood lehx.. also duno y.. maybe cos straight afta tt ish common test wk.. sho durin the hols nit to study... SIANX.. k la tts all i wannna fa xie todae.. =)

jus another ordinary dae for mi.. go sch.. go home... hahax.. again mi n cc pon lectuer but tis time ish OCOM lecture... den went to CP mac to study again.. act kind of like to study dere wif cc.. cos we nt onlie study and tok alot.. den gotto noe each other betta.. dun misunderstood lehx.. we nt les.. jus best friends.. hehex den rmb she suddenly asked,'hey y u dun find a bf arx?' haahx.. sort of stunned by her qns.. cos she like mo ming qi miao pop up tis qns... hahax.. but den it makes mi tink tt.. it ish diff to find a person hu loves u n u loves him.. sho... cherish the u be wif.. or u wil regret.. like i do... :P hmm..ya tink tts all i wana sae bax.. minasan.. oyasumi nasai~~!
urlLink cc, joy, candy(bdae gal) n me !! urlLink

todae reallie tiredx.. mornx act suppose to mit jieying at 830 de but in the end overslp.. sho go sch as usual time.. den reallie hen qiao lor... every wed will mit roy in bus dex.. hahax but not sho close wif him.. den paisehx din even sae hello.. hehex den go for tutorials lorx.. will sho slpy le.. but den cannot slp like sec sch time.. cos tutorial cls damn small onlie 18 students.. den jiu mux geng lorx.. hahax.. afta tt nehx.. go SIM eat.. on the way isk n esther sang M2M de 'the day u went away'.. liew reallie hen duo gan chu nehx.. hahax.. can feel tt the tears like gg to flow out like tt.. of cos i try to control myself lahx.. if nt verli dui lian de lehx.. hahax den go SIM eat chicx chop.. liew not nice lorx.. pple seein mi blog.. take note arx.. nv go dere eat chicx chop arx.. nt nice de.. tink i onlie waste mi money niax.. den eat liaox go back sch for lecture lorx.. lecture... chao sian lorx.. wher gt lecture interesting de.. hahax. hmm den found out tt i gotto sat qt near 'hu du cong' hahax.. but sho wat ritex.. :P hmm tink tts all i wanna sae todae.. oh ya n cc... poor her.. fell down den her toe nail kena.. see liao sho tong lorx.. hope tt she mei shi le.. hao ba write till here.. sayo~~ gd nitex~~ mis ya~~!!
urlLink bestest friend urlLink

haix.. reallie si bei sianx lehx.. sian until now at CP mac doin nth.. jus anyhow surf net.. hahax.. hmm.. todae skipped OB lecture.. bad horx.. hahax but hu care.. :P todae saw him nehx.. den he was sitin jus ritex behind durin BSTATS .. hmm duno y like.. dun reallie very excited like i use to be when c him le lorx... hmm.. he reallie shuaix but den dun haf tt special tingy anymore bax.. hahax.. den cc horx.. like still verli excited abt him nehx.. hahax.. den todae in BSTATs lecture horx.. kendrick reallie sway.. kena chase out by tt stupid bloody lecturer... reallie dun like him lehx.. ang mo oso sho lan... sho mani pple tokin..y kendrick kena. haix.. den reallie gou yi qi to c isk clar bob pei him go out loxrx.. hmm tink dey went to play pool bax.. haax

yox.. long time din write blog liaox leh.. hehex.. suddenli feel like writing.. cos seems like verli fun like tt... jus now look thru mi fren de blog den click on mi last time de blog.. sho mani mem siax... hahax altho onlie write a few.. still can feel tt mem i haf when i was writin tt entry... haix.. tt time was sho hapie... as for now... ying gai shi yi yang de ba.. :)
